newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Rational Software lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Rational Software lowered.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said it lowered it rating on Rational Software Corp to market perform from strong buy.

-- Analyst James Moore said, "Until they complete the (Pure Atria Corp) acquisition, we don't have a real good sense of where the numbers (results estimates) will go. There is a lack of visibility beyond September."
-- Earlier today, Rational said it agreed to acquire Pure Atria by swapping 0.90 shares of Rational for each Pure Atria share.
-- The analyst said he left unchanged his earnings estimates for the two upcoming periods, the fiscal fourth quarter ended last month and the first quarter ending in June.
-- For the March quarter, Moore said he expects earnings of $0.15 per share on $41 million in revenues and for the June quarter $0.16 per share on $43 million in revenues.
-- In early afternoon Nasdaq trade, Rational shares were off 6-7/8 at 16-1/2 and Pure Atria tumbled 7-1/8 to 10-5/8.
